name: Apple Tarts

ingredients.name: natural peanut butter butter or almond butter
Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix, Apple Pie Spice or Cinnamon

preparation: Spread apple slices with DIY New-tella. Top with berries.
tips: Use the 4-in-1 Mandoline to make skinny apple slices. Pick out and discard any seeds.

products.name: Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix
summary: If you could capture sweet summer in a jar, this would be it. A tangy, fruity blend of raspberries, strawberries, hibiscus, and a touch of rooibos, Summer Berry works as a dip or seasoning for yogurt, oatmeal, smoothies, and more.

products.name: Apple Pie Spice
summary: Move over pumpkin spice; it's time for Apple Pie Spice to shine! Perfect for leveling up the taste of fall-inspired baking, it's also great on top of oatmeal, in a frothy late or smoothie â€“ or anywhere you want a punch of apple pie flavour.

products.name: Cinnamon (Ground)
summary: A simple blend of organic cinnamon that brings the flavour. Great for baking, desserts, egg nog, or enhancing the taste of Middle Eastern and Indian dishes.

products.name: 4-in-1 Mandoline
summary: Perfect for cutting thin slices & shredding veggies. 4 slicer settings: 2 slice & 2 julienne options.
